Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory556.jpg'}
{3: 'A familiar dizziness sets in.'}
{3: 'You have experienced this feeling of waking up from a dream countless times.'}
{3: 'You feel the cold touch of skin on your face.'}
{3: 'Right. You were with Cerberus earlier.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory701.jpg'}
{3: 'You are about to set out to Constellia from a conservation area when you find out that Cerberus is conducting an investigation near Constellia after what must be a recent mission.'}
{3: 'They cannot disclose the remaining details, so you do not ask.'}
{2: "I'll drive this time. I insist.", 3: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Why do you wanna drive so badly? What are you up to?', 4: '1', 18: '100003047'}
{2: 'Just let me do it.', 3: '31'}
{3: "You have worked with these three enough times to know what will happen if you agree to let No. 21 take the driver's seat."}
{3: 'From both personal experience and the rumor mill, you know nothing good ever happens when you put "Cerberus" and "vehicles" together.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Alright. Since the Gray Raven Commandant is so eager to drive, you two just sit back and relax.', 4: '1', 18: '100003048'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I\'ve updated the "driving roster." The new order is Commandant, No. 21, Captain, and Noctis.', 4: '1', 18: '100003049'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Why did I get pushed back again?!', 4: '1', 18: '100003050'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Because Noctis never drives properly and always messes up.', 4: '1', 18: '100003051'}
{3: 'Theoretically, there should not be any problems along the way, and the navigation also indicates the weather is good today.'}
{3: 'But you absolutely cannot leave the fate of the vehicle to them before you depart.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'The argument between No. 21 and Noctis still echoes in your memory. Given the state you find yourself in, it can only mean one thing.'}
{2: '(This feeling on my back...)', 3: '58'}
{3: 'Realizing this, your instincts kick in, quickly sorting out your thoughts.'}
{2: '(Slowly open your eyes)', 3: '60'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryZhengyan.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/Weila/UiMovieWeilaSkin01/UiMovieWeilaSkin01.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryZhengyan.prefab'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "The commandant's eyes are open!", 18: '100003054'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Lucky you. I was going to slap you.', 18: '100003055'}
{3: "No. 21's tone is calm, her gaze directed somewhere out of your sight."}
{3: 'The dizziness slowly subsides, but it will still be a while before you can control your body. But this also is not unusual for you.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Let's do a routine check. How many fingers am I holding up?", 18: '100003057'}
{3: 'Vera holds up one finger.'}
{3: 'Vera slaps you hard.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Want to try again?', 18: '100003058'}
{3: 'Vera slaps you real hard.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Give it another shot.', 18: '100003060'}
{2: '(Shake her hands and then let go)', 3: '84'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Good dog. Do you remember your name?', 18: '100003062'}
{2: 'F.O.S. Chief, Gray Raven Commandant...', 3: '87'}
{3: 'Vera pulls you up and absentmindedly dusts you off.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory556.jpg'}
{2: 'So, what happened?'}
{3: 'No. 21 points at an old vehicle on the ground. Based on its size, it must have been easily destroyed by the jeep that crashed into the tree on the other side.'}
{3: 'Finally having the chance to examine the crash, you also find several mechanoids stuck in the mud.'}
{3: 'This means it was not a Construct or a human driving the old vehicle just now. Regardless, you did not expect a normal car could navigate such terrain.'}
{3: 'Tracing the tire marks left by the drifting jeep, you finally remember what caused the accident.'}
{2: 'Right, it was because...', 3: '101'}
{3: 'You tried to avoid the old vehicle and ended up skidding into a tree.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "That's right. You owe me 10k Black Cards, Commandant.", 4: '1', 18: '100003065'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "You couldn't dodge it and crashed the jeep. There's no escape now, Commandant.", 4: '1', 18: '100003066'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Right, we should put it in writing. You can make the transfer as soon as we get a signal.', 4: '1', 18: '100003067'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Can you share some with me?', 4: '1', 18: '100003068'}
{3: 'Seeing that you are trying to make a call with your terminal, Vera walks over.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Don't bother. We already confirmed there's no signal. Luckily, No. 21 downloaded the map, so we're not lost.", 4: '2', 18: '100003070'}
{2: 'By the way, what are you guys carrying?', 3: '117'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'We found them on these guys.', 4: '1', 18: '100003071'}
{3: 'Noctis points at the mechanoids on the ground. You have no idea if they have merely passed out or if they are...'}
{2: "Wait. If they're awakened machines...", 3: '120'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'They just shut down to protect their data. A manual reboot will wake them up... except for this one.', 4: '1', 18: '100003072'}
{3: 'A pretty damaged humanoid mechanoid lies on the ground. Its injuries are indeed more severe.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'No. 21 accessed its data to find out where it came from.', 4: '2', 18: '100003073'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I only managed to access its model number and this document.', 4: '3', 18: '100003074'}
{3: 'Noctis briefly summarizes the content recorded by the "ST-100" mechanoid, and you obtain a copy of the story through your terminal.'}
{2: 'This storyteller mechanoid...', 3: '129'}
{2: 'It sounds like a lost item from the WGAA.', 3: '130'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Unfortunately, the WGAA never developed such a model, and it wasn't from Constellia either.", 4: '1', 18: '100003075'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "And there's no signal here, the area we were tasked to investigate. Guess who got the development rights of this place back then?", 4: '1', 18: '100003076'}
{3: 'Vera makes a "hush" gesture, and the answer is obvious.'}
{2: 'Would Kurono really hire these people?', 3: '136'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Who knows? There's nothing they're not capable of. Anyway, we're too close to Constellia to investigate in the open. Let's put on some disguises.", 4: '1', 18: '100003077'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You wouldn\'t want us to "accidentally" take out a few of these mechanoids during the mission, right? That\'s going to snowball into something interesting.', 4: '1', 18: '100003078'}
{2: "If they're connected to this place...", 3: '139'}
{2: 'These mechanoids might not be here just to make a movie.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'We ran a test with the broken mechanoid earlier. They mainly identify each other through their monitors.', 4: '1', 18: '100003079'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'It matches some of the requirements of antique mechanoids. Something to do with their consciousness, maybe?', 4: '1', 18: '100003080'}
{2: 'What if they really are awakened machines?', 3: '145'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Any damage Cerberus does to awakened machines will be blamed on you, since you\'re the active commandant with us, and your "misdeeds" will reflect on Babylonia. Regardless, I don\'t care.', 4: '1', 18: '100003081'}
{2: 'But why... do we have to dress like this?', 3: '150'}
{2: "But we're mainly doing this for the investigation... right?", 3: '156'}
{3: "Vera's smile is somewhat mischievous."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We really just needed to alter a few recognition points. Putting on the costumes was a whim. There's no car to take you back anyway.", 4: '1', 18: '100003085'}
{2: 'I guess I have no reason not to help.', 3: '162'}
{3: 'The smoking jeep does not look like it can be saved, after all.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Get familiar with your "script." You\'re the only one who hasn\'t read it yet.', 4: '1', 18: '100003086'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I can run lines with you if you want.', 4: '1', 18: '100003087'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'By the way, would you be thrilled if I call you "my liege" one day, 【kuroname】?', 4: '1', 18: '100003088'}
{2: 'Want to give it a shot right now?', 3: '172', 4: "Doesn't feel right.", 5: '173'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Why don't you save the Black Cards you owe No. 21 for your stay at the Star of Life?", 4: '1', 18: '100003089'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I was hoping to see a more interesting reaction.', 4: '1', 18: '100003090'}
{3: 'Vera picks up the straw hat next to the box and puts it on you, and the four of you follow the tracks of the old vehicle into the mountains.'}
